Serina uses the Headspace app, one of GEICO's free mental health benefits, to support her long-term wellness goals through weekly check-ins that help her manage her stress and stay balanced. ‚Äã
‚Äã
Beyond mindfulness, Serina finds connection and belonging through ABLE. "ABLE provides a safe space for me to connect with others around the country and where everyone feels like they belong," she said. ‚Äã
‚Äã
If you're looking for opportunities with a company committed to our employees' mental health, apply here: https://lnkd.in/eTTGHtHu

Terri has been a strong advocate for our benefits offerings, encouraging her colleagues to learn about the resources available to help them prepare for whatever lies ahead. She uses her voice to remind others to prioritize their health and maintain a positive outlook through life's toughest challenges. ‚Äã
‚Äã
GEICO is committed to supporting our employees' well-being every step of the way with comprehensive health benefits, including preventive care services such as annual mammogram screenings‚ÄØ, Cigna Critical Illness Insurance, and enhanced cancer support through Cigna's Pathwell Specialty program.

Kristopher L., a leader on our Claims team at GEICO, welcomed a new daughter this summer and adjusted to his new life as a family of five in those first two months thanks to GEICO‚Äôs Bonding Leave benefit. ‚Äã
‚Äã
At GEICO, we understand that growing your family means more than preparing a nursery or learning to swaddle. It‚Äôs about being present for the¬†milestones, the early mornings, and the quiet moments that matter most.¬†‚Äã
‚Äã
That‚Äôs why,¬†as part of our commitment to offering Great Rewards, our Bonding Leave program is designed to support all parents, helping them build and grow their households with meaningful time to bond with their new child.¬†‚Äã
‚Äã
‚ÄúBonding leave ensures parents can be there for the first smiles, the first cries, and the moments that matter most ‚Äì building a lifetime of connection from day one,‚Äù says Kristopher.¬†‚Äã

GEICO, a member of the Berkshire Hathaway family of companies, constantly strives to make lives better by protecting people against unexpected events while saving them money and providing an outstanding customer experience. Visit geico.com to learn more‚ÄØ 
 
‚ñ™Ô∏è Building a Diverse Workforce ‚ñ™Ô∏è

‚ñ™Ô∏è Supporting Our Communities‚ÄØ‚ñ™Ô∏è
Our commitment to being an engaged and involved corporate citizen is important to us. We work with supportive partners across the country that help us provide resources for people in need. Authenticity and inclusiveness are paramount as we give back to our communities.‚ÄØ 

‚ñ™Ô∏èGEICO Cares‚ÄØ‚ñ™Ô∏è 
Our employees can make a big impact by participating in company-wide social impact programs such as Giving Back Together and FastPitch. They can also volunteer with local and national organizations such as Shoes That Fit, Reading is Fundamental, and more.‚ÄØTo learn more, visit GEICO in the Community.‚ÄØ
